knimeNode.name: Filter Dispatcher
knimeNode.shortDescription: Route all filtering options regarding conditions to related data.

fullDescription.intro: The node ensures that filter operations on conditions are also routed to related data. Filtering conditions requires this node to precede the Load Related Data node. No configuration is required. The data itself will not be manipulated.

ports.inPort: A table containing selected test conditions.
ports.outPort: A table containing selected test conditions, prepared for the node Load Related Data.
